name: The Dressor Group Ltd
description: In need of help from overhead material h
overview:
In need of help from overhead material handling specialists? From providing your gantry crane of choice to repairing your hoist, inspecting your worksite and providing your staff with crane and hoist operator training to help you comply, The Dressor Group does it all.

We like to think that if you have a need, we can partner with you and find the solution it requires.

Our company

With over 35 years in the material handling business, Dressor is a name you can rely on.

Our dynamic team of professionals come to the job from a variety of fields. Our staff consists of:

Sales Professionals Electricians Millwrights Welders Service Technicians Engineers Together, our expertise in the industry, which is supported by CSA standards, gives us the ability to provide you with the solutions you need – no matter what your inquiry may be.
